docs.title: Welcome to Bootcamp Docs 🚀
docs.text: This documentation contains workflows, feature descriptions, and technical details for the Bootcamp project.

docs.title: About Bootcamp
docs.text: Bootcamp is an online platform designed to help students learn and track their progress through various learning modules. The platform provides various tools like quizzes, discussions, and workflow automation to make learning more efficient.

docs.title: Technology Stack
docs.text:
• Frontend: React.js, HTML, CSS
  • Backend: Node.js, Express.js
  • Database: MongoDB
  • Hosting: Vercel, GitHub Pages

docs.title: Architecture
docs.text:
This document describes the high-level architecture of the system.

  • Frontend: React-based UI
  • Backend: Node.js REST API
  • Database: MongoDB
  • Authentication: JWT-based

docs.title: May 7
docs.text:
• Set up folder
  • Installed MkDocs
  • Created basic doc structure

docs.title: Design Document
docs.text: This document provides details about the system design.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
Here are the key features of the Bootcamp application:

  • User Authentication: Secure login and registration system.
  • Progress Tracking: Monitor your learning progress.
  • Interactive Workflows: Easy-to-follow steps for various processes.
  • Notifications: Receive updates and reminders for tasks and deadlines.

docs.title: Login Flow
docs.text:
This section describes the flow of the login process.

```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant User participant Frontend participant Backend participant Database

User->>Frontend: Login form
Frontend->>Backend: API Request
Backend->>Database: Verify credentials
Database-->>Backend: Result
Backend-->>Frontend: Success/Failure
Frontend-->>User: Show message

docs.title: Registration Flow
docs.text:
This section describes the flow of the registration process.

```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant User participant Frontend participant Backend participant Database

User->>Frontend: Fill registration form
Frontend->>Backend: Send registration data
Backend->>Database: Save user data
Database-->>Backend: Success
Backend-->>Frontend: Registration successful
Frontend-->>User: Show success message

docs.title: Login Sequence
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant Frontend
    participant Backend
    participant Database

    User->>Frontend: Login form
    Frontend->>Backend: API Request
    Backend->>Database: Verify credentials
    Database-->>Backend: Result
    Backend-->>Frontend: Success/Failure
    Frontend-->>User: Show message
